channel.description: Recent content in üè¢ ETH Zurich on HF Daily Paper Reviews by AI

item.title: Relightable Full-Body Gaussian Codec Avatars
item.description: Relightable Full-Body Gaussian Codec Avatars: Realistic, animatable full-body avatars are now possible using learned radiance transfer and efficient 3D Gaussian splatting.

item.title: Reasoning Language Models: A Blueprint
item.description: Democratizing advanced reasoning in AI, this blueprint introduces a modular framework for building Reasoning Language Models (RLMs), simplifying development and enhancing accessibility.

item.title: GSTAR: Gaussian Surface Tracking and Reconstruction
item.description: GSTAR: A novel method achieving photorealistic rendering, accurate reconstruction, and reliable 3D tracking of dynamic scenes with changing topology, even handling surfaces appearing, disappearing, or…

item.title: UIP2P: Unsupervised Instruction-based Image Editing via Cycle Edit Consistency
item.description: UIP2P: Unsupervised instruction-based image editing achieves high-fidelity edits by enforcing Cycle Edit Consistency, eliminating the need for ground-truth data.

item.title: LoRACLR: Contrastive Adaptation for Customization of Diffusion Models
item.description: LoRACLR merges multiple LoRA models for high-fidelity multi-concept image generation, using a contrastive objective to ensure concept distinctiveness and prevent interference.

item.title: Do I Know This Entity? Knowledge Awareness and Hallucinations in Language Models
item.description: LLMs’ hallucinations stem from entity recognition: SAEs reveal model ‘self-knowledge’, causally affecting whether it hallucinates or refuses to answer. This mechanism is even repurposed by chat finet…
